job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to comprehending the underlying issues or needs before developing a solution.

job_tasks.phrase: designing the solution by quick prototyping
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping is a core software development activity focused on designing and testing solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: delivering and running our services in production
job_tasks.justification: This refers to the practical implementation and operation of software products.

soft_skills.phrase: part of the full product development process

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on general software development and product lifecycle management without specific mention of AI, ML, or generative models. It lacks the technical depth required for specialized AI roles like ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer.
